00023 #ifndef __DATASET_H__
00024 #define __DATASET_H__
00025 
00026 #include <iosfwd>
00027 
00043 class DataSet 
00044 {
00045  public :
00047   virtual ~DataSet() {};
00049   virtual DataSet *newcopy () const = 0;
00051   virtual DataSet *set_intersect (const DataSet & b) const  = 0;
00053   virtual DataSet *set_union (const DataSet & b)  const = 0;
00055   virtual DataSet *set_minus (const DataSet & b) const = 0;
00057   virtual bool empty() const = 0;
00059   virtual DataSet *empty_set() const = 0;
00061   virtual bool set_equal(const DataSet & b) const =0;
00063   virtual bool set_less_than (const DataSet & b) const =0;
00065   virtual long double set_size() const = 0;
00067   virtual size_t set_hash() const =0;
00069   virtual void set_print (std::ostream &os) const =0;
00070 #ifdef EVDDD
00071   virtual DataSet *normalizeDistance(int n) const =0;
00072   virtual int getMinDistance() const = 0;
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 };
